general.description:
A Passionate People Focused, Strategic and Commercial Executive Recruitment Practice Lead and Search Professional.

Interests include: Digital Robotics (Robotic Process Automation/RPA) Artificial Intelligence, SWARM Intelligence, Connected Car, Autonomous Car Technology, Machine Learning, Operational Excellence, Business Change & Lean Six Sigma Transformation, Business Process Improvement, Innovative Start up's & Early Stage Companies.

Global experience working at the Middle to Senior Executive level for organisations who look to gain or maintain a competitive advantage position. 

I maintain an agnostic industry sector focus, while continuing to follow my passion for People, Process, Technology, Disruption and Business Change, Innovation & Transformation.

Selection of career highlights spanning the past 12 years include:

•	Exclusive Recruitment assignment: Partner with European Managing Director to build out the   
European Consultancy arm of George Group Consulting prior to a successful trade sale to Accenture.
•	Search & Selection Assignment: Partner with Global COO for the selection of a new COO Western  Europe for Gett.com an Uber disruptor in the UK.
•	Recruitment Assignment: Partner directly with the VP responsible for building the original Lean Consulting capability for Capgemini Consulting.
•	Recruitment Assignment: Partner with Head of OpEx to successfully source the new Head of Robotic Process Automation for RSA UK.
•	Search & Selection Assignment: Partner with Global CEO to source & select a new UK Operations Director – Global Management Consultancy (Client Confidential)
•	Recruitment Assignment: Identify & Source new VP Operational Excellence Lead for Macquarie Investment Bank

Established and extensive professional network relationships (11k+ Personal LinkedIn Connections) we apply our Intelligence, knowledge and our market leading insights to identify and select only the highest performing professionals for your organization..

jobs.description:
Henderson Bond is a specialist, industry agnostic recruitment company that brings an authentic consultancy approach to the clients we serve through Honesty, Transparency and Integrity.

We provide specialist human capital resources within the Business Improvement sector, including, Operational Excellence, Lean Six Sigma, Automation Technology (Robotic Process Automation/RPA, Artificial Intelligence/AI, Machine Learning/ML) and Executive Appointments.

By placing the focus back on the “people-centric” element of the Industry, by respecting the confidential nature of our role and adapting our processes in line with our clients, we create increased value during every step of the recruitment process.

With established and extensive specialist professional networks around the globe, we deliver through “KIP” Knowledge, Impetus, and Precision, at every stage, resulting in;

•	Improved competitive advantage, 
•	Market positioning 
•	Future potential growth for our clients. 

Creating the optimum “Recruitment Strategy” is imperative to winning the war on talent. We understand this and provide Strategic & Advisory services to clients offering invaluable insights and advice that will retain and attract the most talented of individuals, ensuring you maintain a competitive advantage, and the organisation of choice in a candidate driven world.

For Candidates “Career Management” can be a powerful tool, we offer objective, carefully thought through strategies and advice aimed at ensuring you are positioned correctly in the future and able to fulfil your true career potential.

jobs.jobTitle: Executive Recruitment Lead - OpEx & Digital Robotics - Innovative Start up's & Early Stage Advisor
jobs.description:
Operational Excellence has many connotations in today's business world. To our Global Executive Recruitment practice it simply refers to the Specialist Recruitment Consultancy support we provide to businesses seeking to improve performance and productivity to gain or maintain competitive advantage.

Operating at the mid to senior level of the organisational structure, our team are experienced in successfully completing assignments for CEO, CCO, CFO COO, CDO, CRO posts, Senior Director, Senior Manager, Manager, Director and Head's of Digital & Robotic Process Automation (RPA) including Lean Six Sigma, Continuous Improvement, Process Excellence, Business and Digital Transformation professionals.

Industry sector and domain expertise includes, Management Consultancy, Strategy Consultancy, Big 4, Investment, Wealth & Retail Banking, Financial Services, Insurance, Automotive & Aerospace Manufacturing and Engineering,  On-Line Retail, FMCG, FinTech, Transport & Logistics, NHS & Healthcare,  Hospitality & Food.

Each client is a leader or innovator in their field and range from global consultancies to newly established, future stars. We are the leading or sole supplier to the vast majority of our clients and our mission is to be that for them all. 

Based in Hertfordshire and Central London our remit is global with particular success seen in Europe, USA and AsiaPac.

Our most long established clients are multinational giants, requiring us to provide outstanding service quality and continuous innovation and expedient delivery. Our SME clients have similarly high expectations - in many cases the addition of one person can make a profound effect upon the success of the organisation. 

We’re a straightforward company to work with - honest and ethical to the core. We don’t over promise, but through our existing networks, innovative mix of talent attraction and acquisition processes, we consistently deliver an exceptional service.

jobs.jobTitle: Head of Services Sector & RPA Practice Lead – UK & Europe
jobs.description:
Since 2001, Pacific International has been delivering international Business Class Recruitment for Lean Six Sigma, Change Management and Strategy specialists across Operations, Procurement and Supply Chain. 

Our customers come from many industry sectors including FMCG, Pharmaceutical and Bio Tech, Manufacturing and Engineering, Financial Services, Insurance, Banking, Automotive, Aerospace, Healthcare, Energy and Management Consulting. This global customer base is serviced from our London and New York offices, handling demand for specialists from the UK, Asia, through Europe and across the Americas.

Pacific is an organisation with true international delivery capability. Many of our customers have a global footprint and our expertise in identifying international talent is often required, particularly when domestic talent supply is limited. We deliver where others can’t for local and International Executive Search & Contingency work.

jobs.description:

We help you develop a Strategy and road map, including Tool Selection, Productivity metrics and ROI Models.

We deploy your RPA solution, establish governance and address IT and security concerns. We also train your staff to maintain the solution.

We manage, monitor, tune and continually optimize your robotic process execution. We also implement enhancements and manage your RPA infrastructure.

- Part of the original team of the Robotic Process Automation Service Line that grew to over 100+ before being acquired by ISG.

Once scoped, performed in-depth analysis with the Subject Matter Expert in order to create the Process Definition Document (PDD), Solution Design Document (SDD) along with supplementary documentation (Discovery Notes, Keystroke Document, Runbook, Training Plans etc…)

jobs.description:
Founded in 1948, Robert Half International (RHI) is the world's first and largest specialized staffing firm. RHI is a recognized leader in professional staffing and consulting services, and is the parent company of Protiviti, a leading independent internal audit and business and technology risk consulting firm.

OfficeTeam is the world's leading staffing service specializing in the placement of highly skilled office and administrative support professionals on a temporary and temporary-to-full-time basis. With a global database of more than 2 million candidates, we have the resources, experience and expertise necessary to match highly skilled professionals to our clients’ hiring requirements. We can provide administrative support throughout an organization. 

Robert Half International again was ranked number one in our industry on FORTUNE® magazine’s list of the “World’s Most Admired Companies.” (FORTUNE, March 22, 2012)

Specialties
The specialized staffing divisions of Robert Half International place professionals in accounting and finance; technology; office administration; law; and the creative, marketing and design fields. We also are the parent company of Protiviti, a leading provider of independent internal audit and business and technology risk consulting services. Our worldwide locations make it easy for people to find the services they need when and where they need them.
